title: Echo Tattoo - Mind Your Step (2007)@flac
description:
Alternative Rock band from Athens, Greece. 

18 years after the bandâ€™s creation, 10 years after their last album release and while the fate of the band was unknown, Echo Tattoo return with their 3rd Album.
â€œMind your stepâ€ was released on th 24th of December 2007 by Recycled Recordings and is currently distributed by Music Mirror and Music Postal Service.
Evi Chassapides Watson songwriter/lead singer of the band is also the producer of this album.
By using sounds from everyday objects as percussion, the voices of friends who were in the studio, samples from her cats even and by mixing the melodies of Echo with her voice, Evi H. W. creates a surreal musical landscape.
Their music is full of passion and the experienced listener can spot influences ranging from soul to progressive, from hard rock to pop.
Panosâ€™ guitars create an atmosphere of celebration and and the voice of Echo Tattoo dances on the fine line between raw power and lyricism.
The guests on this album are some of the most important performers of the Greek Alternative Scene: Argy of â€œNightstalkerâ€, Tanya L of Liquidust and the full cast of Bliss (Vags, Chris, Stef) unite their voices for â€œCAVEMANâ€ while Alex K of â€œthe Earthboundâ€ and â€œThe Last Driveâ€ leaves his mark on â€œAPOCALYPSEâ€.
In these times of cynicism, Echo Tattoo keep talking for humans rights, against the vicious cycle of blind money making and the only freedom we have left that presents itself in love and empathy.
